column6: This is it, the final showdown between the X-Men and the terrorist branch of the Morlocks.  But how can they win with Warpath and Hepzibah captured and Storm buried under a ton of debris?  The future is at stake and it all centers on Magneto.  But what role will the former Master of Magnetism play?
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Jason Keith | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
